name: 1st
heading: First:
p: Click on "search bar" and enter places to display where to visit.

name: 2nd
heading: Second:
p: Click on "toilet" button to display accessible toilets.

name: jx
heading: Third:
p: Click on "carpark" button to display accessible carparks.

name: jx
heading: Fourth:
p: Click on "compass" button to locate yourself.

name: jx
heading: Fifth:
p: Click on "-" button to zoom out.

name: jx
heading: Sixth:
p: Click on "+" button to zoom in

name: 1st
heading: Seventh:
p: Click on "Satellite" button to display the satellite map

name: 1st
heading: Eighth:
p: Drag the Pegman button onto the map to open panorama street view

name: 1st
heading: Ninth:
p: Click the first button to open "full screen" mode and second to exit

name: 1st
heading: Tenth:
p: Click this button to display the guide again
